mapper.select: select * from bbs_t order by b_idx desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_t(subject, writer, content, f_name, pwd, write_date, hit) values(#{subject}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{f_name}, #{pwd}, sysdate(), 0)
mapper.update: update bbs_t set hit = hit + 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx}
update bbs_t set subject = #{subject}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, f_name = #{f_name} where b_idx = #{b_idx}
